alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 21 at 9:13PM MDT until August 21 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of north central Montana, including the following areas, East Glacier Park Region and Northern High Plains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Areas of terrain will be at risk for rock slides, mud slides, and debris flow, especially in and below burn scars. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Beware of rapidly changing conditions if outdoors, especially over or near higher terrain. Have multiple ways to receive warnings and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains
